net.dv8tion.jda.core.exceptions

Class PermissionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • net.dv8tion.jda.core.exceptions.PermissionException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HierarchyException, InsufficientPermissionException

    public class PermissionException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Indicates that the currently logged in account does not meet the specified Permission from getPermission()
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getPermission

        public Permission getPermission()
        The Permission that is required for the operation

        If this is a HierarchyException this will always be Permission.UNKNOWN!

        Returns:
        The required Permission
